split:
\begin{split}
 [W'R]_-&= \tfrac{1}{2} R^2, \\
 %
 [W'T+{\mathop{\mathrm{tr}}\nolimits}(m'M)]_-&=
 \begin{cases}
  \left(T-\frac{2}{z}\right)R    & \text{$SO$ antisymmetric}, \\
  \left(T-2\frac{d}{dz}\right)R  & \text{$SO$ symmetric    }, \\
  \left(T+\frac{2}{z}\right)R    & \text{$Sp$ symmetric    }, \\
  \left(T+2\frac{d}{dz}\right)R  & \text{$Sp$ antisymmetric},
 \end{cases}
 \\
 %
 2[(Mm)_{ff'}]_-     &=  R\delta_{ff'    }, \\
 2[(mM)_{{\tilde{f}}{\tilde{f}}'}]_- &=  R\delta_{{\tilde{f}}{\tilde{f}}'},
\

\begin{split}
 [W'{\bf R}_{S^2}]_- &= \tfrac{1}{2}({\bf R}_{S^2}{})^2
 \\
 %
 [W'{\bf R}_{RP^2}]_-
 &=
 \begin{cases}
  \left({\bf R}_{RP^2}-\frac{1}{2z}\right){\bf R}_{S^2}           & \text{$SO$ antisymmetric} \\
  \left({\bf R}_{RP^2}-\frac{1}{2}\frac{d}{dz}\right){\bf R}_{S^2}& \text{$SO$ symmetric} \\
  \left({\bf R}_{RP^2}+\frac{1}{2z}\right){\bf R}_{S^2}           & \text{$Sp$ symmetric} \\
  \left({\bf R}_{RP^2}+\frac{1}{2}\frac{d}{dz}\right){\bf R}_{S^2}& \text{$Sp$ antisymmetric}
 \end{cases}
  \\
  %
  [W'{\bf R}_{D^2}+{\mathop{\mathrm{tr}}\nolimits}(m'{\bf M}_{D^2})]_-  &= {\bf R}_{D^2} {\bf R}_{S^2}
  \\
  %
  2[({\bf M}_{D^2} m)_{ff'}]_-     &= {\bf R}_{S^2} \delta_{ff'}
  \\
  %
  2[(m {\bf M}_{D^2})_{{\tilde{f}}{\tilde{f}}'}]_- &= {\bf R}_{S^2} \delta_{{\tilde{f}} {\tilde{f}}'} ,
\

\begin{split}
 R(z)
 &=
 {\bf R}_{S^2}(z),
 \\
 %
 T(z)
 &=
 N\frac{\partial}{\partial {\bf S}}{\bf R}_{S^2}(z)
 +4{\bf R}_{RP^2}(z) +{\bf R}_{D^2}(z),
 \\
 M(z)&={\bf M}_{D^2}(z)
 \

\begin{split}
 R(z) &= {\bf R}_{S^2}(z),
 \qquad
 %
 w_\alpha(z) = w_\alpha\frac{\partial}{\partial {\bf S}}{\bf R}_{S^2}(z),
 \\
 %
 T(z)
 &=
 N\frac{\partial}{\partial {\bf S}}{\bf R}_{S^2}(z)
 +\frac{w_\alpha w^\alpha}{2}\frac{\partial^2}{\partial {\bf S}^2}{\bf R}_{S^2}(z)
 +{\bf R}_{D^2}(z),
 \\
 M(z)&={\bf M}_{D^2}(z)
 \
